parameters.sqlQuery:
MERGE `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.sales` T
USING `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.sales_stage` S
ON T.SALE_ID = S.SALE_ID

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    SALE_NUMBER = S.SALE_NUMBER,
    LOCATION_ID = S.LOCATION_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CLIENT_ID = S.CLIENT_ID,
    APPOINTMENT_ID = S.APPOINTMENT_ID,
    SALE_DATE = S.SALE_DATE,
    LOCATION = S.LOCATION,
    CLIENT = S.CLIENT,
    CLIENT_GENDER = S.CLIENT_GENDER,
    TEAM_MEMBER = S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    STATUS = S.STATUS,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL = S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    PAYMENT_METHOD = S.PAYMENT_METHOD,
    TRANSACTION_TYPE = S.TRANSACTION_TYPE,
    PAYMENT_STATUS = S.PAYMENT_STATUS,
    SERVICE_CHARGE = S.SERVICE_CHARGE,
    CLIENT_SOURCE = S.CLIENT_SOURCE,
    CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE = S.CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE,
    ITEMS_SOLD = S.ITEMS_SOLD,
    TOTAL_SALES = S.TOTAL_SALES,
    GROSS_SALES = S.GROSS_SALES,
    NET_SALES = S.NET_SALES,
    TOTAL_REFUNDS = S.TOTAL_REFUNDS,
    TOTAL_DISCOUNTS = S.TOTAL_DISCOUNTS,
    TOTAL_TIPS = S.TOTAL_TIPS,
    TOTAL_PAYMENTS = S.TOTAL_PAYMENTS,
    TOTAL_TAXES = S.TOTAL_TAXES,
    TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGES = S.TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGES,
    TOTAL_GIFT_CARDS = S.TOTAL_GIFT_CARDS,
    TOTAL_CHANGE_AMOUNT = S.TOTAL_CHANGE_AMOUNT,
    AMOUNT_DUE = S.AMOUNT_DUE,
    TOTAL_PAYMENTS_AND_REDEMPTIONS = S.TOTAL_PAYMENTS_AND_REDEMPTIONS,
    TOTAL_GIFT_CARD_REDEMPTIONS = S.TOTAL_GIFT_CARD_REDEMPTIONS,
    TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGE_TAXES = S.TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGE_TAXES,
    GIFT_CARD_TAXES = S.GIFT_CARD_TAXES,
    CURRENCY_CODE = S.CURRENCY_CODE,
    _loaded_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    SALE_ID,
    SALE_NUMBER,
    LOCATION_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CLIENT_ID,
    APPOINTMENT_ID,
    SALE_DATE,
    LOCATION,
    CLIENT,
    CLIENT_GENDER,
    TEAM_MEMBER,
    STATUS,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    PAYMENT_METHOD,
    TRANSACTION_TYPE,
    PAYMENT_STATUS,
    SERVICE_CHARGE,
    CLIENT_SOURCE,
    CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE,
    ITEMS_SOLD,
    TOTAL_SALES,
    GROSS_SALES,
    NET_SALES,
    TOTAL_REFUNDS,
    TOTAL_DISCOUNTS,
    TOTAL_TIPS,
    TOTAL_PAYMENTS,
    TOTAL_TAXES,
    TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGES,
    TOTAL_GIFT_CARDS,
    TOTAL_CHANGE_AMOUNT,
    AMOUNT_DUE,
    TOTAL_PAYMENTS_AND_REDEMPTIONS,
    TOTAL_GIFT_CARD_REDEMPTIONS,
    TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGE_TAXES,
    GIFT_CARD_TAXES,
    CURRENCY_CODE,
    _loaded_at
  )
  VALUES (
    S.SALE_ID,
    S.SALE_NUMBER,
    S.LOCATION_ID,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.CLIENT_ID,
    S.APPOINTMENT_ID,
    S.SALE_DATE,
    S.LOCATION,
    S.CLIENT,
    S.CLIENT_GENDER,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    S.STATUS,
    S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    S.PAYMENT_METHOD,
    S.TRANSACTION_TYPE,
    S.PAYMENT_STATUS,
    S.SERVICE_CHARGE,
    S.CLIENT_SOURCE,
    S.CLIENT_RETENTION_SOURCE,
    S.ITEMS_SOLD,
    S.TOTAL_SALES,
    S.GROSS_SALES,
    S.NET_SALES,
    S.TOTAL_REFUNDS,
    S.TOTAL_DISCOUNTS,
    S.TOTAL_TIPS,
    S.TOTAL_PAYMENTS,
    S.TOTAL_TAXES,
    S.TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGES,
    S.TOTAL_GIFT_CARDS,
    S.TOTAL_CHANGE_AMOUNT,
    S.AMOUNT_DUE,
    S.TOTAL_PAYMENTS_AND_REDEMPTIONS,
    S.TOTAL_GIFT_CARD_REDEMPTIONS,
    S.TOTAL_SERVICE_CHARGE_TAXES,
    S.GIFT_CARD_TAXES,
    S.CURRENCY_CODE,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
  );
